input_text:
Job Title: Co-Founder

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Join with UrbanNest as Non-Technical Co-Founder - Make Your Mark in App Development and VC!
Are you a dynamic and ambitious individual with a knack for strategic thinking and a passion for innovation? InfroLabs, the leading app development company in Spain, is on the lookout for a talented non-technical co-founder to join us and help drive our ambitious vision forward.About Us:InfroLabs is not just another app development company - we're pioneering a new approach to startup incubation and venture capital. Rated highly on platforms like Clutch, we are transforming the landscape by offering discounted app development in exchange for equity, effectively creating a global dev incubator turned VC. By building a diverse portfolio of companies with minority stakes, we're running a private equity model without the need for hefty investments.Job Description:As Non-Technical Co-founder, you'll be at the forefront of the company's growth and success. Your primary responsibility will be leading all marketing efforts and shaping the strategic direction of the organization. Collaborating closely with the founder CEO, you'll drive your company direction, strategy, and product development. This role presents an incredible opportunity to leave a lasting impact in a rapidly expanding market.This isn't your typical 9-to-5 job - it's about bootstrapping and building something truly transformative.What You'll Do:Lead all marketing efforts and initiatives, leveraging your creativity and strategic vision to drive growth.Work closely with the founder CEO to shape company direction, strategy, and product strategy.What We're Looking For:A proven track record of success and ambition, with a passion for driving innovation and growth.Entrepreneurial mindset and willingness to embrace the challenges of bootstrapping and building something from the ground up.How to Apply:If you're excited about the opportunity to join InfroLabs and help shape the future of app development and venture capital, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a brief paragraph explaining why you're passionate about joining InfroLabs.
This is a role which involves bootstrapping, hence not a traditional job post.
Please submit your resume, and a quick paragraph explaining why you are excited about joining Infrolabs.

Watsapp:- +34 633779821

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Non-Technical Co-Founder
output_json.summary: Join UrbanNest as Non-Technical Co-Founder - Make Your Mark in App Development and VC!
job_responsibilities: Lead all marketing efforts and initiatives, leveraging creativity and strategic vision to drive growth.
Collaborate closely with the founder CEO to shape company direction, strategy, and product strategy.
output_json.company_information: InfroLabs is a leading app development company in Spain, pioneering a new approach to startup incubation and venture capital. Rated highly on platforms like Clutch, they offer discounted app development in exchange for equity, creating a global dev incubator turned VC. They run a private equity model without hefty investments, building a diverse portfolio of companies with minority stakes.
